caption.p: Prophylactic/therapeutic approaches to COVID-19. (A) Potential therapeutic anti-viral approaches during the early phase of infection. (B) Potential anti-inflammatory strategies targeting the alveolar space during the SARS period of COVID disease. (C) Immune intervention (vaccination of the population prior to epidemic episodes) or use of convalescent plasma/hyper-immune globulins on infected patients. LYM: lymphocytes; other acronyms are as described in Figure 1.
